text.value: You cannot select none if you have selected a danger sign!
Does have any of these danger signs?
Did you refer and accompany to the health facility?
Follow up task will appear on
Tasks will appear when follow up is needed.
Refer to health facility
_Be sure you submit to complete this action._
Person to visit health facility alone
You cannot select 'Was not accompanied' if you have selected another option!
Who accompanied for the PNC visit?
Has had any health facility PNC visit since delivery?
_Plan to accompany mother for 1 week facility PNC visit._
_Encourage mother to go to the health facility for PNC visit._
Date cannot be in the past!
Select the date of the next PNC visit
Which facility PNC visit are you reporting?
Which day are you visiting the mother at home?
Indicate which day you visited the mother
Date cannot be in the future!
Select date when PNC visit was done
Person to visit health facility alone
Chongani chizindikiro china chiri chonse chomwe chiri chofunika
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale chizindikilo china chowopysa
Follow up task will appear on
**Ulendo wotsatila wa sikelo ya mayi uli pa:**
_Pelekezani ku chipatala kuti akalandire chithandizo china._
_Wonetsetsani kuti mwatumiza tsambali kuti mumalize ntchito iyi._
Chongani chizindikiro china chiri chonse chomwe chiri chofunika
Sankhani tsiku la ulendo otsatila wa ku sikelo ya mayi akachira
Sikelo ya sabata yachisanu ndi chimodzi
Kodi ulendo wa kusikelo mukulemberawu ndi wa liti?
Ndi Tsiku liti lomwe mukumuyendera mai pakhomo pake?
Sankhani tsiku lomwe anapita ku sikelo
Sikelo ya sabata yachisanu ndi chimodzi

bind.calculate: if(not(selected(../../danger_sign_screening/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../../danger_sign_screening/danger_signs) >= 1, 'Ali ndi zizindikiro zoopsa', 'Alibe zizindikiro zoopsa')
